content.p: The School of Physics offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. Please click on the images below for more information. Get information on our undergraduate courses, scholarships, open days, the selection process and more. Get information on postgraduate study in the school, funding and projects. Visit Virtual Nottingham If you can't attend an open day or would like to explore before visiting, take a look at Virtual Nottingham. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
